narratives.title: Inbound
narratives.narrative: 6:40 AM. The platform is cold and quiet as you wait for the train. The same train you've taken every weekday for years. You pull your beige trenchcoat tighter around your shoulders as you scan the empty platform. A distant rumble signals the approaching train. Just like yesterday, and the day before, and all the days stretching back through the calendar of your memory.
narratives.meterContext: As the train approaches, your mind begins to...

outcomes.text: Think about the life you once dreamed of
outcomes.title: Inner Reflection

outcomes.text: Observe the world around you
outcomes.title: Social Awareness

outcomes.text: Review your upcoming work presentation
outcomes.title: Career Focus

narratives.title: Drone
narratives.narrative: The train lurches forward as you settle into your usual seat. Through the window, the suburbs slide by in a blur of sameness. You're halfway through the commute when your phone buzzes. It's your boss: "I need that report finished by noon." You were planning to take lunch with an old friend today, someone you've been meaning to reconnect with for months.
narratives.meterContext: How will you respond to this conflict?

outcomes.text: Keep the lunch date, rush the report later
outcomes.title: Value Relationships

outcomes.text: Reschedule lunch for another day
outcomes.title: Find Balance

outcomes.text: Cancel lunch, finish the report
outcomes.title: Prioritize Work

narratives.title: Write Along The Way
narratives.narrative: Your college journal sits on your nightstand, gathering dust. Inside are fragments of stories you once wanted to write, dreams you once planned to chase. Tonight, you find yourself flipping through its pages, feeling a strange spark that hasn't flickered in years. The blank page calls to you.
narratives.meterContext: As your fingers hover over the empty page, you decide to...

outcomes.text: Start writing again, even if just for yourself
outcomes.title: Self-Expression

outcomes.text: Write a letter to reconnect with an old friend
outcomes.title: Reach Out

outcomes.text: Draft ideas for your work presentation instead
outcomes.title: Get Ahead

narratives.title: Last Life
narratives.narrative: It's 2AM. The blue light of your monitor is the only illumination in your apartment. "Just one more level," you told yourself three hours ago. Your friends have invited you out countless times, but the digital world feels safer, more controllable. Your character stands victorious on screen, but the victory feels hollow.
narratives.meterContext: As the victory screen fades, you find yourself...

outcomes.text: Log off and text your friends about weekend plans
outcomes.title: Reconnect

outcomes.text: Go to bed, you'll text friends tomorrow maybe
outcomes.title: Self-Care

outcomes.text: Start a new game, you're on a roll tonight
outcomes.title: Achievement

narratives.title: Strange Passenger
narratives.narrative: A stranger sits beside you on today's commute - something that never happens in your carefully regulated routine. They're reading a book you loved years ago. Your eyes meet, and there's a strange pull, an unexpected connection. They smile, and for a moment, the train seems less gray.
narratives.meterContext: The book in their hands sparks a memory, and you...

outcomes.text: Strike up a conversation about the book
outcomes.title: Open Up

outcomes.text: Smile politely and return to your thoughts
outcomes.title: Gentle Acknowledgment

outcomes.text: Look away, relationships are too complicated
outcomes.title: Stay Focused

narratives.title: For Me
narratives.narrative: Your neighbor just bought a new car - sleek, expensive, turning heads. Your reliable old vehicle suddenly seems inadequate. The showroom downtown is having a sale. You don't need a new car, but the thought of rolling up to work in something impressive plants itself in your mind.
narratives.meterContext: As you consider your options, you decide to...

outcomes.text: Your current car is fine, save your money
outcomes.title: Inner Satisfaction

outcomes.text: Look at used cars that balance practicality and image
outcomes.title: Social Impression

outcomes.text: Visit the dealership, get what you deserve
outcomes.title: Status Symbol

narratives.title: Bioavailable
narratives.narrative: Your doctor mentions your blood pressure during your annual checkup. "Stress," he says. "You need to find ways to relax." But the constant emails, the deadlines, the mortgage payments - they create an addictive cycle of pressure. The adrenaline rush of solving one crisis after another has become your normal.
narratives.meterContext: Leaving the doctor's office, you consider his advice and decide to...

outcomes.text: Take prescribed medication, make lifestyle changes
outcomes.title: Self-Healing

outcomes.text: Make minor adjustments to your routine
outcomes.title: Ask for Support

outcomes.text: You thrive under pressure, it's fine
outcomes.title: Power Through

narratives.title: Outbound
narratives.narrative: A work conference in another city. As the return train pulls away from the station, you realize you didn't check your email once today. The world didn't end. For the first time in years, you watch the scenery without your mind racing ahead to the next task. Something is shifting inside you.
narratives.meterContext: As you consider this moment of peace, you decide to...

outcomes.text: Enjoy the moment, stay disconnected
outcomes.title: Present Awareness

outcomes.text: Share your realization with a friend
outcomes.title: Shared Insight

outcomes.text: Check your phone, you've been irresponsible
outcomes.title: Duty First

narratives.title: Life Between Life
narratives.narrative: A former colleague has died suddenly. At the funeral, people speak of his achievements, his career. But no one mentions joy, passion, or love. You recognize yourself in the tributes - a life measured in promotions and acquisitions. The thought follows you home like a shadow.
narratives.meterContext: As you reflect on what you've heard today, you feel compelled to...

outcomes.text: Start a bucket list of experiences, not achievements
outcomes.title: Life's Meaning

outcomes.text: Reach out to old friends you've lost touch with
outcomes.title: Restore Bonds

outcomes.text: Double down on your career, legacy matters
outcomes.title: Double Down

narratives.title: Squares
narratives.narrative: The pandemic has transformed your dining room into an office. Your world has contracted into Zoom squares, each one a tiny window into other lives similarly confined. The boundaries between work and home have dissolved. You haven't left your apartment in three days.
narratives.meterContext: As another meeting invitation appears on your screen, you find yourself...

outcomes.text: Set strict work boundaries, reclaim your space
outcomes.title: Reclaim Control

outcomes.text: Organize a virtual social event with colleagues
outcomes.title: Digital Connection

outcomes.text: Work longer hours, show your dedication
outcomes.title: Career Opportunity

narratives.title: Star Light
narratives.narrative: 3:17 AM. You stare at the ceiling, watching the star-shaped chandelier cast shadows as cars pass by outside. Sleep eludes you night after night. Your mind races with everything you've done and everything you've failed to do. The star seems to pulse with each anxious thought.
narratives.meterContext: Realizing sleep won't come easily tonight, you reluctantly...

outcomes.text: Get up and write down your thoughts
outcomes.title: Emotional Release

outcomes.text: Text a friend who might also be awake
outcomes.title: Midnight Confidant

outcomes.text: Check work emails to distract yourself
outcomes.title: Productive Insomnia

narratives.title: Sick of Home
narratives.narrative: You notice the crack in your living room wall for the first time, though it's probably been there for years. Looking around, you see the faded furniture, the dusty shelves, the life you've been sleepwalking through. This place doesn't feel like home anymore - or perhaps it never really did.
narratives.meterContext: The realization weighs on you, and you decide to...

outcomes.text: It's time for a major change in your life
outcomes.title: Radical Change

outcomes.text: Invite friends over to help redecorate
outcomes.title: Community Project

outcomes.text: Focus on work so you can afford a better place
outcomes.title: Future Investment

narratives.title: Contact High
narratives.narrative: You find yourself on a train platform, but not your usual one. You don't remember deciding to come here. The departures board shows destinations you've never visited. A sense of liberation washes over you - the realization that you could go anywhere, be anyone. For the first time in years, possibilities feel endless.
narratives.meterContext: Standing before the departures board, you find yourself ready to...

outcomes.text: Board a train to somewhere new
outcomes.title: Spontaneous Adventure

outcomes.text: Call a friend to meet you in the city
outcomes.title: Shared Experience

outcomes.text: Return to your usual routine
outcomes.title: Practical Choice

narratives.title: The Letter
narratives.narrative: In your hands is a resignation letter. You've written and deleted it a dozen times over the years, but this version feels different. Final. Your boss would be shocked - you've always been the reliable one, the steady worker, the company drone. But something has changed inside you.
narratives.meterContext: With the letter completed, you must decide to...

outcomes.text: Submit the resignation letter
outcomes.title: Liberation

outcomes.text: Talk to colleagues about new opportunities
outcomes.title: Network Change

outcomes.text: Save it as a draft, reconsider later
outcomes.title: Security First

narratives.title: The Feel
narratives.narrative: The train slows as it approaches your station - the same one you've departed from and arrived at thousands of times. But today, you don't automatically rise from your seat. The doors open. Other passengers file past. You remain seated, watching the familiar platform. The same platform that will be there tomorrow, and the next day. Unless...
narratives.meterContext: As the conductor announces the final call, you make your decision to...

outcomes.text: Stay on the train, see where it takes you
outcomes.title: New Beginning

outcomes.text: Get off, but call someone important to you
outcomes.title: Meaningful Connection

outcomes.text: This is your stop, you have responsibilities
outcomes.title: Steadfast Reliability

standard.title: STANDARD CHALLENGE
standard.narrative: Balance is key. Find the right amount of effort without going too far.

critical.title: CRITICAL MOMENT
critical.narrative: Perfect timing required. This is your one chance - a single moment will define everything.

noOvershot.title: MEASURED RESPONSE
noOvershot.narrative: Finding balance is crucial. Neither too little nor too much will serve you here.
